name: PIPIKO
description:
CONTROLS----------------------

WASD- move

LMB- shoot

RMB- roll

SPACEBAR- jump

F- interact

E- use tool

TIPS------------------------------

Chests can be found throughout the level to upgrade your stats and give you health

Almost everything can be shot and destroyed

Shops are found before boss fights

You can only hold one gun and one tool, so choose wisely

The heavy rock tool gives the player a critical hit chance on enemies

The captured gives the player two extra jumps

The short knife gives the player extra damage when close to enemies

The screen bomb is a one-time use item that clears the screen.

Bosses give you more coins when killed

Soundtrack created by treeno

Character by BasoonPlatoon

Donate to support those who helped make this game: https://ko-fi.com/sheeb
